sentences.sentence: Many men are needed to emend this book.
sentences.translation: 修订这本书需要许多人手。

sentences.sentence: I am going to emend the second passage in this book.
sentences.translation: 我打算对该书中的第二节进行修改。

sentences.sentence: Objective To emend the grading methods of the hypertension and cure effect in a year.
sentences.translation: 目的修订高血压病一年防治效果的评估方法。
